name: XAREA 51
description:
This game was made for Bratislava Game Jam 2020.

Theme: Disinformation and Conspiracy Theories

Team: Fingame

Members

Programming : Michal Hudek, Martin Hajdin

Art: Martina Lacková, Marek Sabo

Game design: All :)

Controls:

A, D -> Horizontal movement

W -> Climb ladder

J -> Jump

K -> Interact, Press buttons

R -> Restart current level

ESC -> Exit level to Main menu
